meta.description: Determine the minimum travel cost for a salesperson to visit each city exactly once and return to the starting city.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: Cities to be visited by the salesperson

vars.name: x
vars.description: 1 if the route goes from city i to city j, 0 otherwise

objective.name: min_total_travel_cost
objective.expr: sum(travel_cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in CITIES for j in CITIES if i != j)

constraints.name: visit_city_1
constraints.description: City 1 must be departed from exactly once

constraints.name: visit_city_2
constraints.description: City 2 must be departed from exactly once

constraints.name: visit_city_3
constraints.description: City 3 must be departed from exactly once

constraints.name: visit_city_4
constraints.description: City 4 must be departed from exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_city_1
constraints.description: City 1 must be arrived at exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_city_2
constraints.description: City 2 must be arrived at exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_city_3
constraints.description: City 3 must be arrived at exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_city_4
constraints.description: City 4 must be arrived at exactly once
